hero.headline: Crafting
hero.subtext: I'm Romedan Abdelhakim, a Full Stack Web Developer who builds high-performance, user-focused applications—shaped by real-world problem-solving experience from clinical practice.

about.headline: Full Stack
paragraphs: I’m a Full Stack Web Developer focused on building fast, scalable, and user-centered applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and cloud-ready architectures. I enjoy turning complex problems into clean, maintainable, and performant solutions.

My core strength lies in designing and developing end-to-end web applications—from responsive front-end interfaces to robust back-end APIs and databases. I work comfortably with modern stacks, version control, authentication systems, and deployment workflows.

With a background in medicine, I bring an uncommon level of precision, structure, and responsibility to software development. This perspective enhances my problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to build systems that users can trust.
